Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI can give frequent feedback. I have had very limited feedback personally or generally from instructors aside from a grade after submission. So I have learnt very little from teacher feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Getting feedback from a teacher feels more valuable and makes you feel better about the work when its a positive comment. feedback from AI doesn't really have any feelings involved.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: I can get feedback from AI before i submit an assignment whereas feedback from teachers has really only been after the fact.
